pageContext.geocode_address: 15301 Wicks Boulevard, San Leandro, CA 94579, USA
pageContext.course_type_long_description: In this full day summer camp, kids experience a half day of playful exercising with Play-Well Move to complement a half day of LEGO® building with Play-Well TEKnologies. Meet new friends while participating in a variety of inclusive activities from games to traditional sports like tag, soccer, and obstacle courses. In the afternoon, retire indoors to build LEGO® machines covering various concepts of engineering, physics, and architecture. Play and fitness mix easily with the guidance of our instructors!
pageContext.course_type_name: Play-Well Move + STEM using LEGO®: FULL DAY
